items.title: 据报道，苹果曾考虑发布 iPhone 17 Air 边框保护壳 (原标题: Apple Has Reportedly Considered Releasing iPhone 17 Air Bumper Case)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
### 苹果考虑为 iPhone 17 Air 发布边框保护壳

根据彭博社的马克·古尔曼（Mark Gurman）报道，苹果公司“曾考虑”为即将推出的 iPhone 17 Air 发布一款边框保护壳。

#### 保护壳特点与目的
*   **设计理念**：这款边框保护壳将类似于苹果在2010年为 iPhone 4 推出的边框保护壳，只覆盖设备的边缘，而不覆盖背面。
*   **材质**：预计将采用橡胶材质。
*   **主要原因**：考虑到 iPhone 17 Air 预计将采用超薄设计，用户可能不愿使用会增加厚度的常规保护壳。边框保护壳将是一个合适的折衷方案，它能在不显著增加厚度的情况下，提供一定程度的防摔和防刮擦保护。

#### 历史背景
*   **iPhone 4 边框保护壳**：苹果曾因臭名昭著的“天线门”事件（即 iPhone 4 在特定握持方式下会导致蜂窝信号接收不良）向用户免费提供 iPhone 4 边框保护壳。

#### 相关配件计划
*   **电池保护壳**：《The Information》的韦恩·马（Wayne Ma）此前报道称，苹果还计划发布一款 iPhone 17 Air 电池保护壳，以提供额外的续航能力。
*   **苹果此前电池保护壳产品**：苹果最后一次发布电池保护壳是针对 iPhone 11 系列，随后推出了已停产的 MagSafe 电池组，适用于 iPhone 12 及更新型号。

#### 发布时间
*   **预计发布**：苹果预计将在今年9月发布 iPhone 17 系列及其相关配件。

![iPhone 17 Air 概念图](https://images.macrumors.com/t/IKLZs9-BPvt-0N-CQYpIx3kz_5Y=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/iPhone-17-Air-Thumb-2-Blue-Electric-Boogaloo.jpg?lossy)
![iPhone 红色边框保护壳](https://images.macrumors.com/t/pAY46X1VicezkSc1HCGrgE5A3Gk=/400x0/article-new/2012/08/product_red_iphone_bumper-e1344951167763.jpg?lossy)

items.content:
Apple has "considered" releasing a bumper case for the upcoming iPhone 17 Air, according to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman.


Similar to the bumper case that Apple introduced for the iPhone 4 in 2010, Gurman said the iPhone 17 Air version of the case would cover the edges of the device, but not the back of it. Those bumper cases were made of rubber.

Given that the iPhone 17 Air is expected to have an ultra-thin design, customers who purchase the device might be reluctant to put it inside of a regular case, due to the added thickness. A bumper case would be a fitting compromise, as it would provide some level of protection against drops and scratches, without being overly thick.


Apple eventually ended up offering customers a free iPhone 4 bumper case, due to the infamous "antennagate" issue, which related to spotty cellular signal reception when the iPhone 4 was held in a way that covered the device's antenna bands.

The Information's Wayne Ma previously reported that Apple also plans to release an iPhone 17 Air battery case, for extra battery life on the go.

Apple last released battery cases for the iPhone 11 lineup, followed by the since-discontinued MagSafe Battery Pack for iPhone 12 models and newer.

Apple is expected to unveil the iPhone 17 series and any related accessories in September.

items.title: AirPods Pro 3 预计今年发布，将带来关键新功能 (原标题: AirPods Pro 3 Expected to Launch This Year With Key New Feature)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
## AirPods Pro 3 预计今年发布，将带来关键新功能

彭博社的马克·古尔曼（Mark Gurman）预测，苹果将在今年晚些时候发布新款 AirPods Pro，并指出这款耳机将配备一项关键的新功能：心率监测。

### 主要发布信息

*   **发布时间**：预计在苹果的秋季产品线中推出。
*   **信息来源**：古尔曼在其“Power On”时事通讯中透露了这一消息。

### 核心新功能：心率监测

*   **关键特性**：AirPods Pro 3 的一个主要亮点是集成心率监测功能。
*   **技术原理（参照 Powerbeats Pro 2）**：
    *   当两只耳机佩戴在耳中并激活心率监测时，LED 光学传感器会以每秒超过 100 次的频率脉冲，通过血流测量心率。
    *   该功能可与流行的健身应用集成，在锻炼期间收集数据，并同步到 iPhone 上的 Apple 健康应用。
    *   这项技术基于 Apple Watch 的心率传感技术。
*   **数据优先级**：如果用户同时佩戴 Powerbeats Pro 2（或未来的 AirPods Pro 3）和 Apple Watch，应用程序将默认使用 Apple Watch 的心率数据。预计 AirPods Pro 3 也会遵循这一逻辑。

### 其他潜在改进

除了心率监测，新款 AirPods Pro 预计还将带来以下改进：

*   改进的音质
*   增强的主动降噪功能
*   设计上的改变

### 现有型号回顾

*   当前的 AirPods Pro 2 于 2022 年 9 月发布。
*   2023 年 9 月，AirPods Pro 2 更新了 USB-C 充电盒和一些其他调整。

### 相关图片

![AirPods Pro 3 心率追踪功能](https://images.macrumors.com/t/BA5ePABu00wOc9SnEzcWGwxitaU=/400x0/article-new/2024/12/AirPods-Pro-3-Heart-Rate-Tracking-Feature.jpg?lossy)

![MacRumors x Bloomberg 横幅](https://images.macrumors.com/t/1af4XiY5l7MKT5h6GgPqIg0XEhQ=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/MacRumors-x-Bloomberg-Banner-Cool.jpg?lossy)

images.alt: AirPods Pro 3 Heart Rate Tracking Feature

items.content:
Bloomberg's Mark Gurman expects Apple to release new AirPods Pro this year, and he said the earbuds will have a key new feature: heart rate monitoring.


From his Power On newsletter today, with emphasis added:
As for Apple's other devices, there's a lot in the fall pipeline — though many of the new products are only incremental upgrades.

There will be Apple Watch updates, faster Vision Pro headsets and iPad Pros with the M5 processor. You should also expect new AirPods Pro earbuds (I reported earlier this year that Apple is working on a pair with heart-rate monitoring), as well as HomePod minis and Apple TV set-top boxes.
Apple already introduced a heart rate monitoring feature on the Powerbeats Pro 2 earlier this year.

When both Powerbeats Pro 2 earbuds are placed in the ears, and heart rate monitoring is active, Apple says LED optical sensors pulse at over 100 times per second to measure heart rate via blood flow. The feature integrates with popular fitness apps to collect data during workouts and sync it to Apple's Health app on the iPhone.

The feature is based on the Apple Watch's heart rate sensing technology. If someone is wearing both Powerbeats Pro 2 and an Apple Watch, Apple says apps default to using Apple Watch heart rate data, and that will likely be the case for the new AirPods Pro too.

Beyond heart rate monitoring, it is likely that the next AirPods Pro will feature improved sound quality, increased active noise cancellation, design changes, and more.

The current AirPods Pro 2 launched in September 2022, and they were updated with a USB-C charging case and a few other tweaks in September 2023.

items.title: 据报道，Apple Health+ 将于明年推出，并新增两项功能 (原标题: Apple Health+ Reportedly Launching Next Year With Two New Features)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# Apple Health+ 服务将于明年推出

根据彭博社的马克·古尔曼（Mark Gurman）的报道，苹果公司预计将于明年推出一项名为 **Apple Health+** 的付费服务。

## 核心功能与特点
*   **AI驱动的健康教练**：Apple Health+ 的核心将是一个基于人工智能的健康教练。
*   **营养规划**：该服务将提供个性化的营养规划。
*   **医疗建议**：用户还将获得专业的医疗建议。

![Apple Health Icon](https://images.macrumors.com/t/uoCeTiMeDJkokV4f1m-xT8Di36A=/400x0/article-new/2025/04/Apple-Health-Icon.png?lossy)

## 发布时间与集成
*   **发布时间**：古尔曼最初预计这项教练功能将作为 iOS 19.4（现称 iOS 26.4）的一部分推出，但后来修正为至少要等到 **iOS 27** 才会上线。
*   **集成方式**：该服务将直接内置于 iPhone 和 iPad 上的苹果“健康”应用中。
*   **服务费用**：目前古尔曼并未透露这项服务的具体费用。

![MacRumors x Bloomberg Banner Cool](https://images.macrumors.com/t/1af4XiY5l7MKT5h6GgPqIg0XEhQ=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/MacRumors-x-Bloomberg-Banner-Cool.jpg?lossy)

## 其他相关热门报道
文章还提到了古尔曼在“Power On”通讯中分享的其他苹果产品传闻，包括：
*   **AirPods Pro 3**：预计今年发布，新增心率监测功能。
*   **iPhone 17 Pro**：预计在未来几周内发布，可能提供橙色版本，并采用铝制边框等12项新功能。
*   **Apple Watch Ultra 3**：距离发布仅几周时间，是自2023年以来首次更新，预计将有显著增强。
*   **iPhone 17 Air 保护壳**：苹果曾考虑为即将推出的 iPhone 17 Air 发布类似 iPhone 4 的边框保护壳。
*   **iPhone 17 系列发布日期**：预计将于2025年9月8日当周的年度发布会上亮相，最有可能在9月9日或10日。
*   **MacRumors 节目**：讨论了 Apple Watch SE 3、Series 11 和 Ultra 3 的预期功能，以及是否值得等待明年再升级。

items.content:
Bloomberg's Mark Gurman today said he expects a paid Apple Health+ service to debut next year.


In his Power On newsletter, Gurman said Apple Health+ will consist of an AI-based health coach that offers nutrition planning and medical suggestions.

Gurman initially expected the coaching feature to be part of iOS 19.4 (now known as iOS 26.4), but he later said that it would not be available until at least iOS 27. It would be built into Apple's Health app on the iPhone and iPad.

He did not say how much the service will cost.

items.title: 折叠屏iPhone传闻将配备四摄像头、触控ID等 (原标题: Foldable iPhone Rumored to Feature Four Cameras, Touch ID, and More)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# 折叠屏iPhone传闻：四摄像头、触控ID及更多细节

根据彭博社的马克·古尔曼（Mark Gurman）的“Power On”时事通讯，苹果首款折叠屏iPhone的更多细节浮出水面。

## 核心配置与功能

*   **摄像头系统**：
    *   折叠屏iPhone将配备**四颗摄像头**。
    *   具体配置包括：一颗前置摄像头、一颗内屏摄像头以及两颗后置摄像头。
*   **生物识别**：
    *   将采用**触控ID（Touch ID）**而非面容ID（Face ID）。
    *   触控ID功能很可能集成在电源按钮上，类似于最新款的iPad Air、iPad mini和入门级iPad型号。
*   **蜂窝连接**：
    *   将使用苹果的**第二代C2调制解调器**进行蜂窝连接。
    *   值得注意的是，该设备将**不配备物理SIM卡槽**。
*   **颜色选项**：
    *   苹果目前正在测试**黑色和白色**两种颜色选项。

## 设计与显示屏

*   **整体设计**：
    *   古尔曼预计折叠屏iPhone将采用**书本式设计**，展开后拥有一个**大尺寸内屏**。
*   **屏幕尺寸（郭明錤预测）**：
    *   苹果供应链分析师郭明錤（Ming-Chi Kuo）此前表示，折叠屏iPhone将配备**5.5英寸的外屏**和**7.8英寸的内屏**。
    *   作为对比，三星Galaxy Z Fold7拥有8英寸内屏和6.5英寸外屏。
*   **无折痕显示屏**：
    *   郭明錤和古尔曼均提到折叠屏iPhone（以及三星Galaxy Z Fold8）将实现**“无折痕”内屏**。
    *   **郭明錤的解释**：苹果将通过使用激光钻孔的金属显示屏板来实现，这种技术可以分散弯曲产生的应力。
    *   **古尔曼的观点**：苹果最近从on-cell显示技术转向in-cell显示技术，他认为这一改变有助于使折叠屏iPhone的折痕“不那么明显”。

## 发布时间

*   古尔曼表示，苹果计划**明年发布**折叠屏iPhone，这与市场普遍预期一致。

## 相关图片

![Apple Foldable Thumb](https://images.macrumors.com/t/WmYNENGA95YGRkAlJXDf2Vqko=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/Apple-Foldable-Thumb.jpg?lossy)

items.translated_title: 折叠屏iPhone传闻将配备四摄像头、触控ID等
items.content:
Apple's first foldable iPhone will be equipped with four cameras, and Touch ID instead of Face ID, according to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman.


In his Power On newsletter today, Gurman said the four cameras will consist of one front camera, one inner camera, and two rear cameras.

The latest iPad Air, iPad mini, and entry-level iPad models have Touch ID power buttons, and this feature will likely extend to the foldable iPhone.

The foldable iPhone will use Apple's second-generation C2 modem for cellular connectivity, but it will lack a physical SIM card slot, said Gurman.

Apple is currently testing black and white color options for the foldable iPhone, he added.

Gurman expects the foldable iPhone to have a book-like design, with a large inner display when unfolded. Apple supply chain analyst Ming-Chi Kuo previously said the foldable iPhone will have a 5.5-inch outer display, and a 7.8-inch inner display.

Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold7 has an 8-inch inner screen, and a 6.5-inch outer screen.

Kuo said the foldable iPhone — and Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold8, will feature a "crease-free" inner display. He said Apple will achieve this feat by using a laser-drilled metal display plate, which can disperse the stress generated by bending.

Gurman said Apple recently pivoted from on-cell to in-cell display technology, and he believes this change should help to make the foldable iPhone's crease "less obvious."

He said Apple plans to release the foldable iPhone next year — as widely expected.

Tags: Foldable iPhone, Mark Gurman

items.title: iPhone 17 Pro 即将推出，配备这 12 项新功能 (原标题: iPhone 17 Pro Coming Soon With These 12 New Features)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
## iPhone 17 Pro 即将推出，配备这 12 项新功能

苹果的 iPhone 17 Pro 和 iPhone 17 Pro Max 预计将在未来几周内发布，目前关于这些设备已有大量传闻。彭博社的马克·古尔曼（Mark Gurman）在其 Power On 通讯中证实了 iPhone 17 Pro 机型将提供“橙色”选项的传闻。

以下是 iPhone 17 Pro 机型传闻中的主要变化：

### 1. 铝制边框
*   iPhone 17 Pro 机型预计将采用铝制边框，而 iPhone 15 Pro 和 iPhone 16 Pro 机型采用钛金属边框，iPhone X 到 iPhone 14 Pro 则采用不锈钢边框。
*   设备的背面据称将采用全新的“部分铝制，部分玻璃”设计。

### 2. 矩形摄像头模组
*   iPhone 17 Pro 机型预计将配备一个大型的矩形摄像头模组。

### 3. 抗反射显示屏选项
*   尽管这一传闻时有时无，但最新消息称 iPhone 17 Pro 机型将提供带有哑光效果的抗反射显示屏选项。
*   这可能与 iMac、MacBook Pro 和 iPad Pro 上提供的纳米纹理玻璃选项相同。

### 4. 重新设计的天线系统
*   iPhone 17 Pro 机型据传将采用重新设计的天线系统，该系统将围绕设备背面大型摄像头模组。
*   这可能会比之前的型号带来改进的 5G、LTE、Wi-Fi 和蓝牙连接性能。

### 5. 橙/铜色选项
*   iPhone 17 Pro 机型预计将新增一种类似铜的颜色选项，以及深蓝色。

### 6. 更长的电池续航（仅限 Pro Max）
*   iPhone 17 Pro Max 据传将采用略厚的机身设计，以容纳更大的电池。
*   iPhone 17 Pro Max 的电池容量将超过 5,000 毫安时。

### 7. A19 Pro 芯片
*   iPhone 17 Pro 机型预计将采用苹果下一代 A19 Pro 芯片，据报道将采用台积电更新的第三代 3 纳米工艺制造。
*   预计与当前 iPhone 相比，性能和能效将有适度提升。

### 8. 12GB 运行内存
*   iPhone 17 Pro 机型，甚至 iPhone 17 Air，据传都将配备 12GB 运行内存。
*   这一升级应有助于提升 Apple Intelligence 的性能和多任务处理能力。所有四款 iPhone 16 机型都配备 8GB 运行内存。

### 9. 2400 万像素前置摄像头
*   所有四款 iPhone 17 机型都将配备升级的 2400 万像素前置摄像头，而所有 iPhone 16 机型都配备 1200 万像素前置摄像头。

### 10. 4800 万像素长焦摄像头
*   iPhone 17 Pro 机型据传将配备升级的 4800 万像素长焦摄像头，高于 iPhone 16 Pro 机型上的 1200 万像素长焦摄像头。

### 11. 双向视频录制
*   iPhone 17 Pro 机型可能允许用户在相机应用中同时使用前置和后置摄像头录制视频。

### 12. 蒸汽腔散热系统
*   所有四款 iPhone 17 机型据传都将采用金属覆盖的电池和其他内部设计更改，以实现更好的散热。
*   蒸汽腔散热系统专门针对 Pro 机型有传闻。

![iPhone 17 Pro on Desk Centered 1](https://images.macrumors.com/t/7V5xZEOQAEJ8L5CpNL6MoauphHw=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/iPhone-17-Pro-on-Desk-Centered-1.jpg?lossy)

items.translated_title: iPhone 17 Pro 即将推出，配备这 12 项新功能
items.content:
Apple's iPhone 17 Pro and iPhone 17 Pro Max should be unveiled in a few more weeks, and there are plenty of rumors about the devices.


In his Power On newsletter today, Bloomberg's Mark Gurman corroborated a rumor that iPhone 17 Pro models will be "available in an orange color."

Below, we recap key changes rumored for the iPhone 17 Pro models:

  • Aluminum frame: iPhone 17 Pro models are rumored to have an aluminum frame, whereas the iPhone 15 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro models have a titanium frame, and the iPhone X through iPhone 14 Pro have a stainless steel frame. The back of the devices will supposedly have a new "part-aluminum, part-glass" design.

  • Rectangular camera bump: iPhone 17 Pro models are expected to have a large rectangular camera bump.
  • Anti-reflective display option: While it has been an on-again, off-again rumor, the latest word is that iPhone 17 Pro models will feature an anti-reflect display option with a matte finish. Perhaps this will be the same nano-texture glass option that is available for the iMac, MacBook Pro, and iPad Pro.

  • Redesigned antenna system: iPhone 17 Pro models are rumored to feature a redesigned antenna system that wraps around the large rear camera bump on the devices. This may result in improved 5G, LTE, Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth connectivity compared to previous models.

  • Orange/Copper color: A new copper-like color option is expected for the iPhone 17 Pro models, along with Dark Blue.

  • Longer battery life: The iPhone 17 Pro Max is rumored to have a slightly thicker design that allows for a larger battery. The iPhone 17 Pro Max will apparently surpass the 5,000 mAh battery capacity mark.

  • A19 Pro chip: iPhone 17 Pro models are expected to use Apple's next-generation A19 Pro chip, which will reportedly be manufactured with TSMC's newer third-generation 3nm process. Like usual, expect modest year-over-year performance gains and power efficiency improvements compared to the current iPhones.

  • 12GB of RAM: iPhone 17 Pro models, and even the iPhone 17 Air, are rumored to have 12GB of RAM. This upgrade should help to improve the performance of Apple Intelligence and multitasking. All four iPhone 16 models have 8GB of RAM.

  • 24-megapixel front camera: All four iPhone 17 models are said to feature an upgraded 24-megapixel front-facing camera, whereas all iPhone 16 models are equipped with a 12-megapixel front-facing camera.

  • 48-megapixel Telephoto camera: An upgraded 48-megapixel Telephoto camera is rumored for the iPhone 17 Pro models, up from the 12-megapixel Telephoto camera on iPhone 16 Pro models.

  • Dual video recording: iPhone 17 Pro models may allow users to record video with the front and rear cameras simultaneously in the Camera app.

  • Vapor chamber cooling system: All four iPhone 17 models are rumored to feature a metal-covered battery and other internal design changes for better heat dissipation. A vapor chamber cooling system has been rumored for the Pro models specifically.
Check out our iPhone 17 Pro roundup to learn more.
